33b5ffb0-b0f8-4d29-b93e-1bf2c7f0fee6.html: Sorry, that’s not correct. This category includes waste and/or disposal of packaging. Since ADM doesn’t know how customers handle packaging material, we can’t dictate that they must recycle. Our leverage is upstream, so we can have more dialogue with farmers.

d75cb1da-db6a-4cbd-b69b-5e226a38b367.html: Sorry, that’s not correct. Scope 3 emission reporting is categorized by ownership and operational control. Leasing is already included in scope 1.

4bf14670-6afd-43f5-a30d-523c1e472438.html: Sorry, that’s not correct. Franchises have no influence on ADM.

929e8887-f1c7-4524-b1b6-08bc83de2e7d.html: Sorry, that’s not a high-impact category that ADM can leverage. Consider categories that we can control.

b1aa41d5-f227-4932-8743-cba0e216d7f3.html: Scroll to choose the three categories with the greatest impact - one at a time - and select Ok. Watch your meters below and the categories in the chart to view the impact on sustainability and ADM's leverage.

52824ca9-cc69-4f43-b78b-8a520bac7956.html: Great job! You have correctly guessed the calegories where ADM has the greatest impact. Take a look at the bar graph on the left to see the relative impact ADM can have on each cateogry then choose next to continue.

4e0f09f8-d1d4-42d3-b472-8458888281b7.html: Good guesses, but none of those categories are ones which ADM has the greatest impact. Choose next to try again.

b4c298e7-ab5e-4ad5-8f87-0dfc0e653ce7.html: You found one! Can you find the other two where ADM has the greatest impact? Choose next to try again.

c44b831b-1169-41e3-bbe5-f4c45aed9658.html: You've correctly chosen two out of three categories! Can you find the third category where ADM has the greatest impact? Choose Next to try again.

45036431-bc1c-4045-b3d0-77b55ea8d161.html: It can be suprising where ADM can have the greatest impact! We've revealed the top three categories. Take a look at the bar graph on the left to see the relative impact ADM can have on each cateogry.

572d5781-8072-467f-b649-8e9439b3d078.html: The purchased goods and services category has a high impact (nearly 2/3 of our scope 3 footprint) and high ADM leverage via regenerative agriculture practices and grower relationships. This category includes anything we procure to run our business that we can control for scope 3 reduction, such as the crops to process, containers for packaging, resins in wastewater treatment centers, IT call centers in India, etc.

7f1dc334-87a8-4e5f-a533-831411e247f6.html: Sorry, that’s not a high-impact category that ADM can leverage. Consider categories that we can control.

12908353-dd37-42f5-b629-5ee0c1327068.html: Even though FERA (Fuel and Energy Related Activities) has a low impact on scope 3 emissions, ADM’s leverage is extremely high. Scope 1 and 2 emissions come from burning coal and gas, but scope 3 impact comes from burning fuel and ADM chooses the fuel we use.

f2ba1042-e08d-4354-9252-d79f42d954fc.html: Upstream transportation has a moderate scope 3 impact with high ADM leverage. This category includes transportation of our product before processing, all commodities (corn, soy, wheat), any transportation paid for, so finished product going to the customer. If ocean shipping, for example, soybeans from Brazil to Europe, ADM can choose the method and vessel type. We can choose newer ships with better equipment and more fuel efficiency to help reduce scope 3 emissions.

212b109b-c66e-4d84-9d61-2939690d5d26.html: Sorry, that’s not a high-impact category that ADM can leverage. Consider categories that we can control.

2bb8f4b1-aabd-4ec9-83a3-49f9c9013d0c.html: Sorry, that’s not a high-impact category that ADM can leverage. Consider categories that we can control.

82c0930a-10cb-409f-854a-1bc98c7c7311.html: Sorry, that’s not a high-impact category that ADM can leverage. Consider categories that we can control.

8a2d5cff-ad25-48ab-b66d-df7166a6353f.html: Sorry, that’s not correct. Scope 3 emission reporting is categorized by ownership and operational control. Leasing is already included in scope 1.

431b20cd-f734-4163-adea-06d865026cb6.html: Sorry, that’s not correct. This category includes emissions after the point of sale.  ADM has no control or leverage on this because our customers are paying ADM, not the other way around.

0c70db87-b50c-43ff-bcf1-ef7fe9155f5d.html: Sorry, that’s not correct. Once the product leaves ADM’s control, we have no influence on how it’s processed. ADM can’t dictate how it’s being used, so there are different emission factors.

4cd08c06-7b02-4fe1-9bb4-ebc1226d767d.html: Sorry, that’s not correct. Once the product leaves ADM’s control, we have no influence on how it’s processed. ADM can’t dictate how it’s being used, so there are different emission factors.
